messages.speech:
These are the things I can do for various environments:.
.
*On Call*
This can be invoked by asking *Who is on call?*

*Deployments*
I can relay scheduled deployment information by asking "Can you show me scheduled deployments?*
I can relay deployment history by asking "What deployments have happened?*
I can relay current deployment by asking "What deployments are happening now?*

*Health*
This can get a health summary by asking *Show me the status*
You can also ask about health of a service or component *Show me the kafka status* or *Is kafka Up/Down?*

*Alerts*
This is invoked by simply saying *show me the alerts for kafka*

*call rate*
I can relay operations per second for services by asking *What is the orders call rate?* or *What is the Cassandra response rate?

*call latency*
I can get call latency for services by asking *What is the orders call latency?* or â€œIs Cassandra slow?

*error rate*
I can relay service error rate per second by asking *What is the orders error rate?*
